## Join our mailing lists

To receive our quarterly EQUATOR Newsletter, [subscribe here](https://www.equator-network.org/category/news/).

To hear about our courses and events in and around Oxford, subscribe to our Oxford mailing list by sending a blank email to equator-oxford-subscribe@maillist.ox.ac.uk.
